sentences.sentence: I am acutely aware of the difficulties we face.
sentences.translation: 我十分清楚我们面临的困难。

sentences.sentence: She was acutely aware of the noise of the city.
sentences.translation: 她敏锐地感受到了城市的噪音。

sentences.sentence: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.translation: 他强烈地觉察到了烹调油的味道。
